title: Respond to agression popping up in chat
body:
So the past few games I have had in the chat for both teams 

-- Respond to Agression -- 1 with aiState7

im not sure what this is or why it keeps popping up. Can a Rioter please help?

replies.body: Those are debug messages (in this case that a neutral monster is being attacked) that are spilling over to the chat. Riot already knows about it and is trying to fix it.
Someone in one of my games said it popped up when someone tried to buy something they can't afford, but I don't know.
The new jungle plants are aggressive.
